  "Allegations" : "ON MARCH 29, 2013, THE SECURITIES DIVISION ENTERED A STATEMENT OF CHARGES AND NOTICE OF INTENT TO ENTER ORDER TO CEASE AND DESIST, DENY FUTURE REGISTRATIONS AND TO IMPOSE FINES AND CHARGE COSTS (\"STATEMENT OF CHARGES\") AGAINST MARK NUOVO (\"NUOVO\"). THE SECURITIES DIVISION ALLEGED THAT NUOVO EFFECTED TRANSACTIONS IN SECURITIES THAT WERE NOT OFFERED OR REVIEWED BY EURO AND OFF THE REGULAR BOOKS AND RECORDS OF HIS BROKER-DEALER FIRM, FAILED TO INFORM HIS BROKER-DEALER FIRM OF HIS OUTSIDE BUSINESS ACTIVITIES IN VIOLATION AND FALSELY FILED FORM U4S WITH THE WASHINGTON STATE SECURITIES DIVISION. THE SECURITIES DIVISION ALSO ALLEGED THAT NUOVO GAVE AT LEAST ONE WASHINGTON INVESTOR A PROFIT PROJECTION WITHOUT DISCLOSING THE MATERIAL BASES AND ASSUMPTIONS UNDERLYING THE PROJECTION. THE SECURITIES DIVISION INTENDS TO ORDER NUOVO TO CEASE AND DESIST FROM VIOLATING THE SECURITIES ACT OF WASHINGTON, DENY FUTURE SECURITIES REGISTRATIONS APPLICATIONS, IMPOSE FINES, AND CHARGE COSTS. NUOVO HAS THE RIGHT TO REQUEST A HEARING ON THE STATEMENT OF CHARGES.",
